titles.title: Congratulating Lock Haven University of Pennsylvania for 140 years of excellence in higher education.
Congratulating Lock Haven University of Pennsylvania for 140 years of excellence in higher education.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Ms. Chu moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1198.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary: Congratulates Lock Haven University of Pennsylvania, in Lock Haven, Pennsylvania, for 140 years of excellence in higher education.
